metadata.title: CVE-2021-47283 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:net:sfc: fix non-freed irq in legacy irq mode SFC driver can be configuredvia modparam to work using MSI-X, MSI or legacy IRQ interrupts. In the lastone, the interrupt was not properly released on module remove. It was notfreed because the flag irqs_hooked was not set during initialization in thecase of using legacy IRQ. Example of (trimmed) trace during module removewithout this fix: remove_proc_entry: removing non-empty directory'irq/125', leaking at least '0000:3b:00.1' WARNING: CPU: 39 PID: 3658 atfs/proc/generic.c:715 remove_proc_entry+0x15c/0x170 ...trimmed... CallTrace: unregister_irq_proc+0xe3/0x100 free_desc+0x29/0x70irq_free_descs+0x47/0x70 mp_unmap_irq+0x58/0x60acpi_unregister_gsi_ioapic+0x2a/0x40 acpi_pci_irq_disable+0x78/0xb0pci_disable_device+0xd1/0x100 efx_pci_remove+0xa1/0x1e0 [sfc]pci_device_remove+0x38/0xa0 __device_release_driver+0x177/0x230driver_detach+0xcb/0x110 bus_remove_driver+0x58/0xd0pci_unregister_driver+0x2a/0xb0 efx_exit_module+0x24/0xf40 [sfc]__do_sys_delete_module.constprop.0+0x171/0x280 ?exit_to_user_mode_prepare+0x83/0x1d0 do_syscall_64+0x3d/0x80entry_SYSCALL_64_after_hwframe+0x44/0xae RIP: 0033:0x7f9f9385800b...trimmed...

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-47283` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-5.15.0-33-generic - 5.15.0-33.34~20.04.1
linux-image-5.15.0-33-generic-lpae - 5.15.0-33.34~20.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-33-generic - 5.15.0-33.34~20.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-33-generic-64k - 5.15.0-33.34~20.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1014-aws - 5.15.0-1014.18~20.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1007-azure - 5.15.0-1007.8~20.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1019-azure-fde - 5.15.0-1019.24~20.04.1.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1006-gcp - 5.15.0-1006.9~20.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1003-gkeop - 5.15.0-1003.5~20.04.2
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1033-ibm - 5.15.0-1033.36~20.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1003-intel-iotg - 5.15.0-1003.5~20.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-33-lowlatency - 5.15.0-33.34~20.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-33-lowlatency-64k - 5.15.0-33.34~20.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1007-oracle - 5.15.0-1007.9~20.04.1
No subscription required
